name: Goodbye Hannah
description:
This experimental short narrative game was developed as a part of Experimental Games Lab Projects of summer semester 2020 by students of the Bauhaus University Weimar. The main goal of the project was to create a game in a short amount of time to study the general game development process and gain new knowledge. 

Credits

Yen Lung Chen - Programmer & Development Design 

Antonius Koschorz - Music & Sound Design 

Alina Rubenchik - Artist &  Visual Game Design
